short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TheFlaMes: Universal Dark Mode enhances your browsing by intelligently applying dark mode to most sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TheFlaMes: Universal Dark Mode enhances your browsing experience by intelligently applying dark mode to most websites, ensuring comfortable viewing."

It comes out with 2 modes which is lite dark mode and super dark mode that allow users to choose the best choice for them 

*NOTES
Make sure to manually switch off the dark mode toggle when trying to switch on the other dark mode feature for a better  experience
